topic.title: Codable Concept
topic.shortdesc: A standard set of named attributes are used to represent Codable Concept types. Where the code is the main code of the corresponding resource, the attribute name used is as shown. Where the code is a secondary code, a prefix to be utilised will also be specified which is then prefixed to form the specified name e.g. a secondary code of reaction may be specified with a prefix of 'reaction' short code r. This would result in attributes in the form 'reaction_snomed_concept_id' long name and r-cid short name.
